fields_of_interest: Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Transport
eu_initiatives:
Proper Implementation of Directive 96/67/EC access to the ground handling market at EU airports. 
EU Social Dialogue Working Group on Ground Handling 
Revision EASA Basic Regulation 
Revision Air Passenger Rights Regulation 
Implementation Regulation 376/2014 on reporting, analysis and follow-up of occurrences
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Industry Organisation for airport ground service providers 
including a European Chapter representing the interests of handlers which are independent from airlines and airports.  
Networking platform e.g. for relations/partnerships with IATA, ACI, ICAO and other relevant stakeholder associations.  
At EU level, prime focus on ensuring a level playing field at airports for all types of handlers. Member of the EU Social Dialogue for Civil Aviation. Relations with EASA.
